gameengine.controller

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • gameengine.controller.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class Game
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.util.Observer
    This class is intended to represent a game containing levels with actors.
    Author:
    colettetorres

    • Constructor Detail

      • Game

        public Game(java.lang.String gameFilePath,
            GameInfo gameInfo,
            java.util.List<Level> gameLevels)
        A game is instantiated with a list of all levels in the game and a level to start on. Upon instantiation, the actors from all levels are collected into a list and added to a map containing references from ID to actor. In addition, a map is created mapping all the actors contained in a level to the level ID
        Parameters:
        levelNum - the first level to play in the game
        gameLevels - all the levels in the game
